long_description: Help your recovery after a hard workout with the Moji Knee ice wrap. Keep the cold cell in your freezer and pull it out when you need it; compression wrap secures the cold cell on your knee. Cold cell features a film that keeps the cell soft and pliable right out of the freezer; cell will keep your knee cold for the recommended 20 min. icing period. Compression wrap is articulated to allow freedom of movement while you ice.
short_description: Help your recovery after a hard workout with the Moji Knee ice wrap.
